content: @Jiang Jiedong Are the formalizations of abstract algebra exercises available?
I need to discuss this with the organizers. However, I don't anticipate that these formalizations will become available very soon.
Do you plan to add the conference here?

Filippo A. E. Nuccio said:

Do you plan to add the conference here?

Definitely yes if possible! Thank you very much!
It suffices to fork the website, modify event.yaml adding your conference, and open a PR.

@Jiang Jiedong This is a surprising date for this workshop. Not only is it really soon, but it conflicts with two other workshops on the same topic the same week:

  • AITP 2024 Sept 1-6
  • Mathematics and Machine Learning - Opening Workshop Sept 3-6
6 messages were moved here from #announce > AI for Mathematics Workshop on Lean, Sep. 2-6, Beijing by Johan Commelin.
@Jiang Jiedong is this workshop still happening? If so, is there a website?
And will the talks be recorded and posted?

Jason Rute said:

Jiang Jiedong is this workshop still happening? If so, is there a website?

It is happening and this is the website. I have no ideas about recordings...

@Jason Rute

If you wish to get the meeting recording, please send me a direct message, specifying your affiliation, and indicating whether you are a student, postdoc, or faculty member. Thank you!
